plot: A man from Montana moves to Los Angeles to follow his dream of becoming an actor. Little does he know, his adventure really begins when he meets his roommates, two model/actors that have no shortage of eccentricities.
plot_en: A man from Montana moves to Los Angeles to follow his dream of becoming an actor. Little does he know, his adventure really begins when he meets his roommates, two model/actors that have no shortage of eccentricities.
plot_es: A man from Montana moves to Los Angeles to follow his dream of becoming an actor. Little does he know, his adventure really begins when he meets his roommates, two model/actors that have no shortage of eccentricities.
title: Pretty, Dumb
